Restaurant.Name: Giovanni's Italia Fine Dinning
Restaurant.Summary: Giovanni's Italia Fine Dinning is a completely restored Victorian stone house and offers a warm and elegant atmosphere and gracious service.

menu_item.name: Crab cakes
menu_item.Description: With a creamy dill sauce served with crispy herbed fries
Garden vegetable soup with chocolate sauce

menu_item.name: Calamari Fritta
menu_item.Description: Tender rings of squid, dusted in flour and lightly fried, served with sun-dried tomato aioli

menu_item.name: Charcuterie Board
menu_item.Description: Selection of cheeses and cured meats served with a variety of breads and crostinis

menu_item.name: House Specialty
menu_item.Description: Pan seared chicken supreme with a sun-dried tomato pistachio pesto cream sauce, served with roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables
Braised jumbo sea scallops on a sun-dried roast tomato base
Free-range chicken breast stuffed with morels in a brandy sauce

menu_item.name: Eggplant Pamigiana
menu_item.Description: Fresh eggplant, thinly sliced and breaded, topped with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese, baked golden brown. Served with linguine in tomato sauce
Roast pork loin on a bed of garlic ginger apple slaw

Restaurant.Name: Gong's Asian Cuisine
Restaurant.Summary: The food is always consistent. A good variety of dim sum, sushi, Chinese and even Vietnamese dishes. The service is quick and the food is plentiful. We sat down last night and within seconds of turning in our first order, the plates were on the table! The teriyaki dishes had the right amount of sauce and weren't sickeningly sweet. The chicken, fish, and beef were perfectly cooked. The makirolls were neatly rolled, cut properly and seasoned well. Loved the General Tao chicken, the steamed BBQ pork buns, the eel sushi and the lovely eggplant. We will be going back again! I would highly recommend it.

menu_item.name: Sweet and Sour Fried Wonton Skin

menu_item.Description: Scallops with Vegetables
Sweet and Sour Fish Cantonese Style
Shrimps with Vegetables
Beef with Mushroom
Beef with Tomato
Beef with Broccoli

Restaurant.Name: Baker Street TexMex Grill
Restaurant.Summary: My favorite restaurant in Ottawa. The family who owns it are very warm and lovely people. They are incredible at recognizing you when you come back. The burritos are super good. You can customize however you want (guac is included!). I especially love that there is cactus in the veggie mix; it is a small, special thing that sets this place apart from other Mexican spots downtown.

menu_item.name: Chips and Pico De Gallo
menu_item.Description: Gluten friendly, vegan, vegetarian
Chips and Black Beans and Cheese

menu_item.name: Sopa de Tortilla
menu_item.Description: Tomato-based soup topped with homemade tortilla strips, sour cream, cheese, and avocado

menu_item.name: Consome de Pollo
menu_item.Description: Chicken broth with rice, chickpeas, carrots, peas, and shredded chicken, served with cilantro, onion, avocado, and lime

menu_item.name: Burrito
menu_item.Description: Ten-inch flour tortilla filled with black beans, rice, lettuce, cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, and choice of protein

menu_item.name: Burrito Combo
menu_item.Description: Ten-inch flour tortilla filled with black beans, rice, lettuce, cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, and choice of protein

menu_item.name: Burrito Roja
menu_item.Description: Ten-inch flour tortilla filled with Mexican rice, black beans, guacamole, and choice of protein. Bathed in Chilaquile's homemade salsa roja

menu_item.name: Enchiladas (3 pcs)
menu_item.Description: Gluten friendly. Lightly sauteed corn tortillas, choice of filling, covered in Chilaquile's homemade salsa verde or salsa roja, topped with onions

menu_item.name: Enchiladas de Mole (3 pcs)
menu_item.Description: Gluten friendly. Lightly sauteed corn tortillas, choice of filling, covered in mole sauce, topped with onions, sour cream, and crumbled cheese
